content.raw: That is a good point. When using C++11 we need users to install a differentl toolchain in Ubuntu Precise (cmake 2.8.7) which  makes the whole thing not ready to work out of the box there. New versions of sdformat and gazebo are not being released to Precise so I'm ok with dropping Precise from now on and backport the change to current ign-math2 branch.
